content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; worker-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3100 https://localhost:3100 https://memes.secure-atom.com/api/post/search/; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; font-src *; img-src * chrome://favicon/ https://memes.secure-atom.com/memes/ 'self' data:; object-src 'self';
